actions.detail:
Your mech can retract its major systems to reduce its profile. While active:
  • rolls to locate you receive +1 difficulty while you are Hidden;
  • ranged and tech attacks against you receive +1 difficulty;
  • you become Slowed and can’t make attacks of any kind;
  • you may take other actions (e.g., Hide, Activate, and so on).
You may end this effect as a quick action.
actions.name: Action

system.description: The hallmark of a well thought out mech frame is the opportunity for pilots to adapt their stock models to the specifications of the environments in which they operate. A retractable profile enables on-the-fly removal of extraneous protrusions, tuning of broadcast software, and masking of heat signatures – all serving to reduce optical and scanner signatures.
